Articles.Content: I want a practical use to large planes on kerbin. The contract should be go to zone g29r and land and go to zone lala and land again with Marty Kerman.
Instead of planting flags - Tourist should pitch a tent so they can stay at a destination for a while.

get contract cofigurator, kerbin side jobs (kerbinside & kerbal constructs).

you will then have bases that can be opened and missions to move people around.
